## Description {#details}

Provides an interface for collecting pass timing information.

It was intended to be generic but now we decided to split interfaces completely. This is now exclusively for legacy-pass-manager use.

Definition at line 59 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/passtiminginfo-cpp">PassTimingInfo.cpp</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### init() {#a8a0041e7f7389ab2feb251f54506c85a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PassTimingInfo.cpp&#125;::legacy::PassTimingInfo::init ()</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Initializes the static <code>TheTimeInfo</code> member to a non-null value when -time-passes is enabled.

Leaves it null otherwise.

This method may be called multiple times.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/passtiminginfo-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/passtiminginfo-cpp">PassTimingInfo.cpp</a>.
